name: Fungle.
description:
Battle your friends and try to ensure that your fungal genus becomes the dominant species on the island. 

Drawing from games like Minesweeper and Battleships, the objective of this RTS/Action Game-crossbreed is to gain points by pinpointing sources of nutritions. Roots of trees are highly sought after. Dead animals are the jackpot.

Spread your spores on tactical locations: Is your strategy to focus on your own growth? Or will you go through lengths to frustrate the attempts of your opponent? It is time to show your true colours.
